patthana21.12:1.1: Nasaññojanaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saññojano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.12:3.1: Naganthaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.12:5.1: Naoghaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ogho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.12:7.1: Nayogaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā yogo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.12:9.1: Nanīvaraṇaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nīvaraṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana21.12:11.1: Naparāmāsaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā parāmāso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
